reviewText: I found it very hard to watch and took the disk out after 20 minutes. The lighting in the movie was very poor and it was hard to see what was going on. Since it wasn't that much money I did not waste my time and more money returning it. If you want to get a movie don't bother with this one unless you like sitting too close to the tv.

Moving, for some might be disturbing but for sure so true to reality this movie touches the most sensitive subject of all times - the children. I strongly recommend it to be seen - just please, keep your mind open. And if such reality is too much for you to take, well then shut your eyes and just listen to the amazing music.
